article_title: Boys Lacrosse State Tournament: Santa Fe Prep wins 2nd straight title
article_text:
ACTIVATE ONLINE SUBSCRIPTION

og.description: The second-seeded Blue Griffins (13-2) scored seven straight goals in the second half to break open a close game and defeat No. 4 Los Alamos 14-7 .
